remarks: The finitary permutations are the span of the transpositions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnval.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnval.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnval.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgneldm2 $p |- ( D e. V -> ( P e. dom N <-> E. w e. Word T P = ( G gsum w ) ) ) $.
$d D w $.
$d G w $.
$d N w $.
